title: Profile Predictor
description: A simple app that predicts the age, gender, and nationality of a name using three APIs after the user submits it.

title: Recipe Landing Page
description: Developed a pixel-perfect landing page that precisely met the customer's requirements.

title: Analyzing Police Statistics
description: Multiple scripts to analyze big data, in this case, data on people who were arrested, such as the violation they did and what age they were. The scripts help the user, to try and identify patterns in the data for example if the age is alot higher for one violation compared to another.

title: Password Manager
description: A password manager that utilises encription

title: Asteroids Game
description: Based on the classic Asteroids game

title: Sortable (To-Do List App)
description: An accessible to-do list app, utilising gestures and animations, to enhance the user experience

title: Portfolio Web Page
description: A responsive website to present all my projects in  a well organised way

title: QuoteSnap Front-End
description: QuoteSnap is an app for Android devices that allows users to take a photo of any inspirational text they see. The app will then use OCR technology to recognise and extract the text

title: QuoteSnap Back-End
description: A full functional database using MongoDB

title: NC News Front-End
description: This project helps users view articles that are stored in an API. Users can also add and delete comments as well as upvote/like their favourite articles

title: NC News Back-End
description: A full functional database using PSQL. You can make multiple requests such as get data by article ID,upvote and add or delete a comment
